name: HappySoaps Kokosnoot en limoen body bar
composition: Ingredients: Sodium Oleate, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Cocoate, Aqua, Glycerin, Parfum, Decyl Glucoside, Cocos Nucifera Powder, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citral, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Pentasodium Pentetate, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Geraniol
